statements: UPDATE game_session SET score = 100, level = 5 WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE game_session SET start_time = '2022-03-15 14:30:00' WHERE player_id = '987e6543-b21d-32e5-f789-543216743210'
UPDATE game_session SET duration = '1 hour 30 minutes', score = 1000 WHERE session_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11'
UPDATE game_session SET score = 2000, level = 5, end_time = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE player_id = 'c19a030d-7cf5-4fc8-9887-6e7fa694e04d'
UPDATE player_session_data SET score = 100 WHERE player_id = 1 AND game_id = 5
UPDATE game_performance_data SET average_score = 75.5, total_play_time = '2 hours' WHERE game_id = 5
UPDATE player_session_data SET score = 500, play_time = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_id = 456 AND session_id = 789;
UPDATE game_performance_data SET average_score = 8.75, total_sessions = 100, total_play_time = '30 hours' WHERE game_id = 456 AND creation_date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE game_sessions SET end_time = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE session_id = 101;
UPDATE player_details SET player_level = player_level + 1, join_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE player_id = 201;

UPDATE games SET genre = 'RPG' WHERE game_id = 1;
